mapper.delete: delete from recipe_favorite rf where (#{recipe_id}, #{name}) = (select r.recipe_id, r.name from recipe r where r.recipe_id = rf.recipe_id)
mapper.select: select r.name, r.member_id, r.content_intro, r.like_num, r.img_url_main, rf.* from recipe_favorite rf, recipe r where r.recipe_id = rf.recipe_id and rf.member_id = #{member_id} and r.name like '%' || #{name} || '%'
